# selectionChanged()

**Instance Method**

Triggers selection feedback.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func selectionChanged()
```

## Discussion

This method tells the generator that the user has changed a selection. In response, the generator may play the appropriate haptics. Don’t use this feedback when the user makes or confirms a selection; use it only when the selection changes.

For information on setting up a feedback generator, see the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIFeedbackGenerator] class.

## Related Documentation

- **prepare()**: Prepares the generator to trigger feedback.

## Reporting selection changes

- **selectionChanged(at:)**: Triggers selection feedback at the specified location.
